listitem.para: Use the new names directly instead
This function is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the library. Please use mbedtls_asn1_free_named_data_list() or mbedtls_asn1_free_named_data_list_shallow().

For the maximum block size of a cipher supported by the CMAC module, use MBEDTLS_CMAC_MAX_BLOCK_SIZE. For the maximum block size of a cipher supported by the cipher module, use MBEDTLS_MAX_BLOCK_LENGTH.

varlistentry.term: Global mbedtls_cipher_setup_psa (mbedtls_cipher_context_t *ctx, const mbedtls_cipher_info_t *cipher_info, size_t taglen)

listitem.para: This function is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the library. Please use psa_aead_xxx() / psa_cipher_xxx() directly instead.

varlistentry.term: Global mbedtls_pkcs12_pbe (mbedtls_asn1_buf *pbe_params, int mode, mbedtls_cipher_type_t cipher_type, mbedtls_md_type_t md_type, const unsigned char *pwd, size_t pwdlen, const unsigned char *data, size_t len, unsigned char *output)

listitem.para: This function is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the library. Please use mbedtls_pkcs12_pbe_ext() instead.

varlistentry.term: Global mbedtls_pkcs5_pbes2 (const mbedtls_asn1_buf *pbe_params, int mode, const unsigned char *pwd, size_t pwdlen, const unsigned char *data, size_t datalen, unsigned char *output)

listitem.para: This function is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the library. Please use mbedtls_pkcs5_pbes2_ext() instead.

varlistentry.term: Global mbedtls_pkcs5_pbkdf2_hmac (mbedtls_md_context_t *ctx, const unsigned char *password, size_t plen, const unsigned char *salt, size_t slen, unsigned int iteration_count, uint32_t key_length, unsigned char *output)

listitem.para: This feature is deprecated. Please switch to the PSA driver interface.

Support for the legacy version of the DTLS Connection ID feature is deprecated. Please switch to the standardized version defined in RFC 9146 enabled by utilizing MBEDTLS_SSL_DTLS_CONNECTION_ID without use of MBEDTLS_SSL_DTLS_CONNECTION_ID_COMPAT.
This function is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the library. Please use mbedtls_x509write_crt_set_serial_raw() instead.
